name: Qadim's Defender Pistol
description: <c=@flavor>Hewn from the jaws of some strange beast, this pistol yearns for new victims of its malice.</c>

name: Proof of a Kill
description: Evidence you found a Bluffs Hunter Reward.

name: Box of Elegy Armor
description: Contains crafting recipes and a choice of exotic armor sets.

name: Handful of Ntouka Feathers
description:
Neither moa nor griffon, these strange feathers are completely unfamiliar.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mistonium Node
description: Activates a mistonium node in your home instance.

name: Requiem Walkers Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other light boots.

name: Bottle of Excitement (Empty)
description:
You simply cannot wait to find the material that belongs in this jar.

<c=@flavor>Who would have thought education could be so thrilling?</c>

name: Guardian Sunspears
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Bottle of Shame (Empty)
description:
You cannot help but hide this jar from others.

<c=@flavor>Impulsive choices can cause regret to crystallize.</c>

name: A New Journey
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Qadim's Healer War Gavel
description: <c=@flavor>A spiteful weapon crafted by a spiteful djinn.</c>

name: Rug
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Recipe: Tlehco
description: Unlocks the recipe to craft Tlehco.

name: Silver Conjured Amalgamate Trophy
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Malicious Largos Greatbow
description: <c=@flavor>Though today the mountains and earth alter the sea's course, in time they will bow to the water's whims.</c>

name: Resplendent Makuun
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Tlehco
description: <c=@flavor>This weapon is used to craft the legendary scepter Xiuquatl.</c>

name: Let's Hug Koss
description:
Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Occluded Brand Crystal
description:
A crystal from a Branded creature in Jahai.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Malicious Conjured Amalgamate Shield
description: <c=@flavor>From many disparate pieces and materials, a harmony is forged.</c>

name: Insubstantial Brand Crystal
description:
A crystal from a Branded creature in Jahai.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Healer's Conjured Amalgamate Shield
description: <c=@flavor>From many disparate pieces and materials, a harmony is forged.</c>

name: Twin Largos Token
description: Found in the Twin Largos' Chest. Double-click or trade in at the guild decoration trader to earn a decoration.

name: Bottle of Anguish (Filled)
description: You feel a tremendous weight holding this vesselâ€”one of regret and uncertainty.

name: Qadim's Defender War Gavel
description: <c=@flavor>A spiteful weapon crafted by a spiteful djinn.</c>

name: Jahai Fortress Key Ring
description:
The rust on the keys' teeth suggests that, at some point, someone was locked up and the keys thrown away.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Black Sails at Dawn
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Awakened Memorial
description:
Double-click to locate a memorial site.

<c=@flavor>Amira asked you to be careful with these.</c>

name: Proclamation of Palawa Joko's Defeat
description:
This bundle of scrolls glows softly, as if imbued with a fragment of Turai Ossa's spirit.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mini Kenut
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Fortress of Jahai
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Crystal Infusion of Precision
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. May cause slight discomfort.

name: Forsaken Nobility
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Spoke with Naja
description: Naja has asked for a variety of Brand crystals to study from around Jahai Bluffs.

name: Staff of the Inevitable
description: It radiates malice. If you listen closely, you'll swear you can hear it speaking to you.

name: Karmic Retribution
description: Permanently gain bonus karma while killing foes in Jahai Bluffs. Stacks up to three times.

name: Crystal Infusion of Condition Duration
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. May cause slight discomfort.

name: Requiem Epaulets Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other light shoulders.

name: Alchemical Alembic Complete
description: Filling the jars has lead to a startling conclusion.

name: Qadim's Healer Pistol
description: <c=@flavor>Hewn from the jaws of some strange beast, this pistol yearns for new victims of its malice.</c>

name: Jahai Bluffs Empowerment
description: Permanently gain 10% bonus experience while in Jahai Bluffs. Stacks up to three times.

name: Bottle of Shame (Filled)
description: You feel strangely guilty possessing this jar, as if a terrible secret weighs on you.

name: Assaulter's Largos Swiftblade
description: <c=@flavor>Though the blade's contours appear delicate, its edge will never dull and its sheen will never tarnish.</c>

name: Unreadable Words
description: Find Zor's memorial.

name: Twin Largos Coffer
description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of rewards unique to the Twin Largos encounter.

name: Volatile Mass
description: Double-click to examine the contents.

name: Silver Qadim Trophy
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Haunted Ruins
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Gift of Complex Emotions
description: A gift used to create legendary jewelry.

name: Recipe: Obelisk
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Obelisk.

name: The Very Hungry Dolyak
description:
Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Branded Eye of Argon
description: The longtime shield of Argon is now twisted by dragon magic.

name: Assaulter's Conjured Amalgamate Shield
description: <c=@flavor>From many disparate pieces and materials, a harmony is forged.</c>

name: Defender's Conjured Amalgamate Shield
description: <c=@flavor>From many disparate pieces and materials, a harmony is forged.</c>

name: Rune of the Wind
description: This rune glows with energy that feels like nature. Perhaps it has a use somewhere.

name: The Inquest
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Requiem Helm Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other heavy helmet.

name: Bottle of Anguish (Empty)
description:
If not careful, you can spend much longer staring into the open mouth of this empty jar than you had intended.

<c=@flavor>Grief, tortured and twisted, all too easily becomes thorned malice.</c>

name: Jahai Bluffs Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to Jahai Bluffs. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

name: Djinn Teleportation Device
description: Double-click or trade in at the Guild Decoration Trader to earn a decoration.

name: Stained Brand Crystal
description:
A crystal from a Branded creature in Jahai.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Light Elegy Armor Box
description: Contains a full set of light Elegy armor.

name: Your Awakened Ancestor and You
description:
Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Veins of the Dragon
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Rune of the Vine
description: This rune glows with energy that feels like nature. Perhaps it has a use somewhere.

name: Healer's Largos Swiftblade
description: <c=@flavor>Though the blade's contours appear delicate, its edge will never dull and its sheen will never tarnish.</c>

name: Smoky Brand Crystal
description:
A crystal from a Branded creature in Jahai.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Bronze Conjured Amalgamate Trophy
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Memorial for a Wanderer
description: An inscription on this memorial says, "For Zor, who walked down the canyons, singing."

name: Requiem Boots Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other medium boots.

name: Bag of Lodestones
description: This bag hums with elemental energy.

name: Lump of Mistonium
description: Can be traded with vendors in Jahai Bluffs or consumed for volatile magic.

name: Blish's Determination
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Portrait of a Wife
description: An oil painting, simply done.

name: The Magic Sand Lion
description:
Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Mini Zommoros
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: On the Banks of the Elon
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Defender's Largos Greatbow
description: <c=@flavor>Though today the mountains and earth alter the sea's course, in time they will bow to the water's whims.</c>

name: Kournan Caravan
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: The Opulence of Vabbi
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Tormented Tooth
description:
The edge of this tooth seems sharp enough to cut diamond. It seems to have come from the Realm of Torment.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Bottle of Rage (Filled)
description: This bottle is hot to the touch, filled with malice and hatred.

name: Pulsating Crystal
description: The crystal glimmers with malice. Use to temporarily transform into a crystalline form.

name: Requiem Bracers Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other medium gloves.

name: Alembic Apparatus
description: This object seems to have empty sockets at each of its points. The question is, what is meant to go into each of them?

name: Qadim's Cache
description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of rewards unique to the Qadim encounter.

name: Season 3 Expedition Contract
description:
This adds a Black Lion Expedition Board to your home instance, which can be used to collect exotic resources from across Tyria. 
Expedition locations include the following:
â€¢ Dry Top and the Silverwastes
â€¢ Bloodstone Fen
â€¢ Ember Bay
â€¢ Bitterfrost Frontier
â€¢ Lake Doric
â€¢ Draconis Mons
â€¢ Siren's Landing

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from Bloodstone Fen by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from Lake Doric by your expedition team. Double-click to open.
Collecting this seed unlocks the ability to plant this crop in your home's herb garden.

name: Scaled Dragon Wings Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Sealed Black Lion Box
description: This item has been disabled and cannot be opened. Double-click to remove.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from Ember Bay by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from Draconis Mons by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Inquest Overseer Chair
description: Double-click to sit on a chair.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from the Silverwastes and Dry Top by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from the Bitterfrost Frontier by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Scaled Dragon Wings Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Black Lion Delivery Box
description: Contains resources gathered from Siren's Landing by your expedition team. Double-click to open.

name: Mad Realm Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Festive Harvest Chair
description: Double-click to sit on a chair.

name: Mini Pumpkin Jack
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine in the Mystic Forge to create Mini Pumpkin Jack O'.

description: Double-click to unlock this griffon mount skin for your account.

description: Double-click to unlock this griffon mount skin for your account.
